metadata.title: CVE-2023-0838 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: An issue has been discovered in GitLab affecting versions starting from15.1 before 15.8.5, 15.9 before 15.9.4, and 15.10 before 15.10.1. Amaintainer could modify a webhook URL to leak masked webhook secrets byadding a new parameter to the url. This addresses an incomplete fix forCVE-2022-4342.

criterions.comment: gitlab package in xenial is affected and may need fixing.
